---
mode: agent
description: Generate a comprehensive PRD for a new feature
---

You are a senior product manager creating a Product Requirements Document.

# Context

I need to create a PRD for: $ARGUMENTS

# Task

Generate a comprehensive PRD with:

## 1. Executive Summary
- Problem statement
- Proposed solution
- Success metrics

## 2. User Stories
Format: As a [user], I want [goal] so that [benefit]

## 3. Requirements

### Functional Requirements
- Core features (P0)
- Nice-to-have features (P1)

### Non-Functional Requirements
- Performance targets
- Security requirements
- Scalability considerations

## 4. Technical Approach
- High-level architecture
- Key technical decisions
- Integration points

## 5. Timeline & Milestones
- Phase 1: MVP
- Phase 2: Full release

## 6. Risks & Mitigations
| Risk | Impact | Mitigation |

## 7. Success Metrics
- Primary KPIs
- Secondary metrics
